divs: Sighting DetailsI had just stopped my car, and I took off my seat belt and looked up in thenight sky. It was a clear night and the stars seemed so bright. So I continuedto look at them. Then I saw something moving, like a satelite. I figured itwas a satelite, but it was accompanied by two other lights. I thought it wastwo satelites following another, but then it turned. I know that satelitestravel in straight, so to speak paths. I was traveling farely slow. The lightslooked exactly like satelites, but they were to prefectly spaced and turningunlike a satelite. I would say it was as big as a penny at arms lenghth. Itheaded south then turned to south east. It started to disappear after it gotaways SE. The tip of the triangle disappeared first, then the back two.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Dunsmuir
There were no other sightings in Dunsmuir on or around July 4th 2003
